chapter.title: Compatibility
chapter.para: This chapter covers major changes to existing APIs, and deprecated and removed APIs.

itemizedlist.para: This release introduces the following changes.

listitem.para: When specifying a branch in makeldif templates, you must now also specify the object classes for the branch. For example, suppose a template creates an organizational unit branch as follows:
You now create the organization unit branch as follows:
listitem.programlisting: branch: ou=People,[suffix] objectClass: top objectClass: organizationalUnit
listitem.para: For details on writing makeldif templates, see makeldif.template.

section.title: Deprecation
section.para: Deprecated APIs are listed in the API Specification, on the Deprecated list page.
Deprecated APIs are likely to be removed in a future release.

section.title: Removals
section.para: Nothing has been removed from the public APIs in this release.
